LuminaTable 2.0.0
  • Reference

Configure Table Layout and Appearance

opt_layout.Rd

Control various layout aspects of the table including dimensions, spacing, borders, and visual styling.

Usage

opt_layout(
  w,
  width = NULL,
  height = NULL,
  maxHeight = NULL,
  striped = TRUE,
  bordered = TRUE,
  borderStyle = "solid",
  compact = FALSE,
  hover = TRUE,
  fontSize = NULL,
  headerHeight = NULL,
  rowHeight = NULL,
  cellPadding = NULL,
  cornerRadius = NULL,
  shadow = FALSE,
  shadowSize = "medium",
  headerSticky = TRUE,
  footerSticky = FALSE,
  wrapText = TRUE,
  textAlign = "left",
  headerAlign = NULL,
  headerBgColor = NULL,
  headerColor = NULL,
  headerFontWeight = NULL,
  headerFontSize = NULL,
  verticalAlign = "middle",
  animation = TRUE,
  animationDuration = "0.3s"
)

Arguments

w

A lumina widget

width

Character. CSS width of the table container (e.g., "100%", "800px", "auto"). Default: NULL (uses widget width).

height

Character. CSS height of the table container (e.g., "500px", "auto"). Default: NULL.

maxHeight

Character. Maximum height before scrolling (e.g., "600px"). Default: NULL.

striped

Logical. Enable alternating row colors (zebra striping). Default: TRUE.

bordered

Logical. Show borders around cells. Default: TRUE.

borderStyle

Character. Border style: "solid", "none", "light", "heavy". Default: "solid".

compact

Logical. Use compact spacing (reduced padding). Default: FALSE.

hover

Logical. Highlight rows on hover. Default: TRUE.

fontSize

Character. Base font size (e.g., "14px", "0.9rem", "small", "medium", "large"). Default: NULL (theme default).

headerHeight

Character. Height of header row (e.g., "45px", "auto"). Default: NULL (theme default).

rowHeight

Character. Height of data rows (e.g., "40px", "auto"). Default: NULL (theme default).

cellPadding

Character. Padding inside cells (e.g., "8px", "0.5rem"). Default: NULL (theme default).

cornerRadius

Character. Border radius for rounded corners (e.g., "8px", "0"). Default: NULL (theme default).

shadow

Logical. Add shadow effect to table container. Default: FALSE.

shadowSize

Character. Shadow size: "none", "small", "medium", "large". Default: "medium".

headerSticky

Logical. Make header row sticky during scroll. Default: TRUE.

footerSticky

Logical. Make footer (pagination) sticky during scroll. Default: FALSE.

wrapText

Logical. Wrap text in cells instead of truncating. Default: TRUE.

textAlign

Character. Default text alignment: "left", "center", "right". Default: "left".

headerAlign

Character. Header text alignment: "left", "center", "right". Default: NULL (inherits from textAlign).

headerBgColor

Character. Header background color (e.g., "#f0f0f0", "lightgray"). Default: NULL (theme default).

headerColor

Character. Header text color (e.g., "#333333", "darkblue"). Default: NULL (theme default).

headerFontWeight

Character. Header font weight: "normal", "bold", "600", "700". Default: NULL (theme default).

headerFontSize

Character. Header font size (e.g., "13px", "12pt"). Default: NULL (theme default).

verticalAlign

Character. Vertical alignment: "top", "middle", "bottom". Default: "middle".

animation

Logical. Enable smooth animations for interactions. Default: TRUE.

animationDuration

Character. Duration of animations (e.g., "0.3s", "200ms"). Default: "0.3s".

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
lumina(mtcars) |>
  opt_layout(
    striped = TRUE,
    compact = TRUE,
    fontSize = "13px",
    cornerRadius = "12px",
    shadow = TRUE,
    headerBgColor = "#e8e8e8",
    headerColor = "#333",
    headerFontWeight = "bold"
  )
  
# Minimal layout
lumina(iris) |>
  opt_layout(
    bordered = FALSE,
    striped = FALSE,
    shadow = FALSE,
    borderStyle = "none"
  )
  
# Dense data layout with custom header
lumina(mtcars) |>
  opt_layout(
    compact = TRUE,
    fontSize = "12px",
    rowHeight = "32px",
    cellPadding = "4px",
    headerAlign = "center",
    headerFontSize = "13px",
    headerFontWeight = "bold"
  )
} # }
